snippet: Tiger Woods appeared determined Tuesday when preparing for the U.S. Open while Phil Mickelson seemed playful. The two are paired together in Thursday’s first round.
abstract: Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson, known for their divergent styles, are paired for the first round of the United States Open; other golf items noted.
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods appeared determined Tuesday when preparing for the U.S. Open while Phil Mickelson seemed playful. The two are paired together in Thursday’s first round.

headline.seo: Woods and Mickelson Are Paired for Thursday’s First Round of the U.S. Open
headline.main: A Dream Pairing of Opposite Stars at the U.S. Open
headline.print_headline: A Dream Pairing of Opposite Stars
